headline: Reassessing Lululemon (LULU) After A 52% Share Price Slide And Mixed Valuation Signals
summary: If you are wondering whether lululemon athletica's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, you are not alone. This article is built to help you make sense of that question. At a last close of US$192.79, the stock sits after a 4.5% decline over the past week, with a 7.7% decline over 30 days, an 8.5% decline year to date, and a 52.1% decline over 1 year, alongside 36.3% and 42.2% declines across the past 3 and 5 years. Recent news coverage around lululemon has focused on how...
